#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gcd(a,b) __gcd(a,b)
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
const int SIZE = 1e6+5;
ll f[SIZE];
int a,b;
void pre(){
f[0]=0;
f[1]=1;
for(int i = 2;i<SIZE;i++) f[i]=((f[i-1])%mod+(f[i-2])%mod)%mod;
}
int main(){
    int tt;
    pre();
    scanf("%d",&tt);
while(tt--){
scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
int idx = gcd(a,b);
printf("%lld\n",f[idx]);}
return 0;
}
